thread.title: Broetry, a new form of storytelling lighting up LinkedIn

title: Broetry, a new form of storytelling lighting up LinkedIn
text:
Broetry, a new form of storytelling lighting up LinkedIn 3:58pm GMT - 02:07 
Broetry. It's a mashup between bro of bro culture, and poetry, and it's taking LinkedIn by storm. Here are some of the viral posts. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
